channel.title: Movement ecology on Applied Population Ecology Lab at UNR
channel.description: Recent content in Movement ecology on Applied Population Ecology Lab at UNR

item.title: Using light-level geolocators to model waterfowl movements and breeding propensity
item.description: This project, supported by the Nevada Department of Wildlife and Nevada Waterfowl Association, uses light-level geolocators to understand the annual migratory pathways of waterfowl in the Pacific flyway, and to assess the timing and location of individual breeding activities. This work is part of a larger effort to monitor wood duck population dynamics and movements in and around Fallon, NV (Fallon Wood Duck Project). Delta Waterfowl: Dr. Chris Nicolai Publications Cook, N.
